required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of In-House Methods and Cobas BRAF V600 Mutation Assay in Melanoma Tumor Samples
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Concordance Between the Methods Used in INCa Platforms and the CobasÂ® 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test for Detection of BRAF V600 Mutations in Melanoma in Real Life Setting

brief_summary.textblock: This non-interventional study will compare the Cobas BRAF V600 mutation assay with in-house methods used in molecular laboratories for the assessment of the BRAF mutation status in melanoma tumor samples. No patients will be enrolled in this study. Data will be collected for approximately 6 months.

primary_outcome.measure: BRAF Mutation Status According to Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test vs. INCa Laboratories Molecular Genetics Laboratories
primary_outcome.description: BRAF V600 mutation status was determined by INCa molecular laboratories "in-house" methods and Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 mutation test. Samples were analysed as V600 mutation, No V600 mutation and Non evaluable. Additionally, the type of V600 mutation (E, K, R, D, E2, other V600 mutation, not specified) was also evaluated only by INCa molecular laboratory "in-house" method.

secondary_outcome.measure: Tumor Sample Characteristics-Type of Tumor Sample
secondary_outcome.description: The type of tumor sample used for evaluation of BRAF V600 mutation whether it was a biopsy or surgical specimen were reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Tumor Sample Characteristics - Source of Tumor Sample
secondary_outcome.description: The source of tumor sample for BRAF V600 mutation detection whether taken from internal or external pathology laboratory were reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Type of Pathology Laboratory Performing the Fixation or Embedding-Pre-analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: The external or internal pathology laboratories involved in the process of fixation or embedding of the tumor sample was evaluated.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time From Sampling to Fixation- Pre-analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: Time taken from the sampling to the fixation of the tumor sample was reported in range of 0-2 hours, 2-6 hours, >6 hours and unknown. Number of samples falling in each of the class were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Type of Fixative Used- Pre-analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: The different types of fixative Excell, formol, alcohol formol acetic acid and other, used to fix the tumor samples were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Fixation Duration by Pre-analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: Fixation duration is defined as the amount of time required in hours for the fixation of a samples. The fixation duration was categorized as <6 hours, 6-24 hours and >24 hours and unknown. Number of samples falling in each category were reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Slice Thickness by Pre-analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: Slice thickness of all the tumour samples was measured. The slice thickness was measured in micrometer.

secondary_outcome.measure: Dewaxing by Pre-analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: Dewaxing is a method to recover the DNA from samples. Dewaxing information was collected as "Yes, No or Missing"

secondary_outcome.measure: Necrosis Percentage Determination by Pre-analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of necrosis defined as the death of one or more cells in the analysed zone was reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Tumor Cells by Pre-analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of tumor cells in the given tumor sample were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Tumor Samples With Presence of Melanin by Pre-analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: The tumor samples with presence of melanin were categorized as Important, Few, Medium and Absent.

secondary_outcome.measure: DNA Extraction - Extraction Method by Pre-analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: This method assessed DNA from the tumor samples was extracted by Automated method or Manual method.

secondary_outcome.measure: Median DNA Elution Volume by Pre-analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: Median DNA elution volume microliters [mcl] was reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean DNA Concentration by Pre-analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: The DNA concentration in the tissue elute was measured in nanogram per microliter (ng/mcL).

secondary_outcome.measure: Amount of DNA by Pre-analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: The total DNA concentration extracted from the tissue was measured in nanogram (ng).

secondary_outcome.measure: Size of Amplicons Used by "In-house" Analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: The method described the size of amplicon used. It was measured in base pairs (bp).

secondary_outcome.measure: Method of Mutation Detection by "In-house" Analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: Allele-specific PCR, High Resolution Melting (HRM) + Sanger sequencing, Pyrosequencing, Sanger sequencing, Real time PCR, SNaPshot were used for BRAF V600 mutation detection.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Samples Punched in In-house Analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: Total number of samples for whom punch was used in 'in-house analytical' method are reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Number of Slices Per Sample Used for "In-house"- Analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: The mean of number of slices per sample when no punch was used are reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Median Time Between Receipt of Samples and Determination of Result by "In-house" Analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: This In-house analytical method measured the time between receipt of samples to the result determination. It measured the time in days.

secondary_outcome.measure: Technician Work Time Between DNA Extraction and Result by "In-house" Analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: The working time required by the technician from the time of DNA extraction to the time to obtain the results was measured in hours.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean DNA Concentration as Measured by COBAS 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test-Analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: The DNA concentration as assessed by COBAS 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation assay was reported. The unit used to measure the DNA concentration was nanogram/microlitre (ng/mcl)

secondary_outcome.measure: Punch Used for Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test- Analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: The punch done during Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test on the sample was described as Yes or No.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Slices Used When No Punch Was Used for Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test- Analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: This describes the Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test, for the mean of number of slices when No punch method, was used. Of the 420 samples, punch was Yes, for 45 samples and punch was No, for 375 samples.

secondary_outcome.measure: Median Time Between Receipt of Sample and Determination of Result by Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test -Analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: This analytical method for cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test measured the time between receipt of samples to the result determination. It measured the time in days.

secondary_outcome.measure: Technician Work Time Between DNA Extraction and Result by Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test - Analytical Method
secondary_outcome.description: This cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test analytical method measures the working time required by the technician from the time of DNA extraction to the time to obtain the results. The time duration was measured in hours.

secondary_outcome.measure: Management of Discordance- Method Used to Manage Discordance
secondary_outcome.description: Crossing DNA, DNA from In-House method analysed with cobas, SNaPshot, DNA from cobas analysed with In-House method, external site control test, Sanger sequencing, Kit CE-IVD Therascreen RGQ Qiagen, Kit Therascreen RGQ BRAF + Pyrosequencing by another platform (PF), Pyrosequencing, Mutation detection On Another Block, (primitive tumor [prm. tmr]), Sequencing And Therascreen kit (Qiagen) were used for management of discordance between "in-house" method and Cobas 4800 mutation test.

secondary_outcome.measure: Management of Discordance-Final Result for BRAF V600 Mutation Detection
secondary_outcome.description: The final results obtained by discordance management of the 28 discordant samples were BRAF V600 mutation, No BRAF V600 mutation and Non-evaluable. These results were further assessed by the Investigator and interpreted as final result.

arm_group.description: BRAF V600 mutations were analysed using INCa (Institut National du Cancer [French National Cancer Institute]) molecular genetics laboratories using "in-house" methods
BRAF V600 mutations were analysed using Cobas 4800 mutation test

study_pop.textblock: No patients are enrolled in this study. Use of melanoma tumor samples.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
No patients are enrolled. Use of tumor samples only.
- Histologically proven melanoma tumor sample
- Any type of tumor sample: biopsy or surgical specimen of primary tumor or metastasis
- Tumor samples must be fixed and paraffin-embedded.
Exclusion Criteria:
No patients are enrolled. Use of tumor samples only.
- Fixative unknown

participant_flow.recruitment_details: The study was conducted from 12 December 2012 to 03 April 2013 which evaluated 420 samples for detection of BRAF V600 mutation in France laboratories.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: A total 420 melanoma tumor samples were analysed in 12 platform laboratories in France. The paraffin-embedded tumour samples were taken from biopsy or surgical specimen from the internal or external pathology laboratory.

group.title: Melanoma Tumor Sample With BRAF V600 Mutation
group.description: BRAF V600 mutations were analysed in melanoma tumor samples using INCa (Institut National du Cancer [French National Cancer Institute]) molecular genetics laboratories using âin-houseâ methods and Cobas 4800 mutation test

baseline.population: Biological samples were analysed rather than samples

group.description: BRAF V600 mutations were analysed in melanoma tumor samples using INCa (Institut National du Cancer [French National Cancer Institute]) molecular genetics laboratories using âin-houseâ methods and Cobas 4800 mutation test

Additionally, the type of V600 mutation (E, K, R, D, E2, other V600 mutation, not specified) was also evaluated only by INCa molecular laboratory "in-house" method.

analysis.groups_desc: Kappa coefficient was used to compare the concordance between INCa Molecular Genetics Laboratory âin-houseâ methods and Cobas 4800 Mutation Test.

group.title: Cobas 4800 Mutation Test
group.description: BRAF V600 mutations were analysed using Cobas 4800 mutation test

measure.title: Punch Used for Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test- Analytical Method
measure.description: The punch done during Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test on the sample was described as Yes or No.
measure.population: All samples meeting the inclusion criteria and not meeting the exclusion criteria were considered for analysis.

outcome.title: Number of Slices Used When No Punch Was Used for Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test- Analytical Method
outcome.description: This describes the Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test, for the mean of number of slices when No punch method, was used. Of the 420 samples, punch was Yes, for 45 samples and punch was No, for 375 samples.
outcome.population: All samples meeting the inclusion criteria and not meeting the exclusion criteria were considered for analysis. Data for the samples where the punch was No=375, was used for analysis.

group.title: Cobas 4800 Mutation Test
group.description: BRAF V600 mutations were analysed using Cobas 4800 mutation test

measure.title: Number of Slices Used When No Punch Was Used for Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test- Analytical Method
measure.description: This describes the Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test, for the mean of number of slices when No punch method, was used. Of the 420 samples, punch was Yes, for 45 samples and punch was No, for 375 samples.
measure.population: All samples meeting the inclusion criteria and not meeting the exclusion criteria were considered for analysis. Data for the samples where the punch was No=375, was used for analysis.

outcome.title: Median Time Between Receipt of Sample and Determination of Result by Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test -Analytical Method
outcome.description: This analytical method for cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test measured the time between receipt of samples to the result determination. It measured the time in days.
outcome.population: All samples meeting the inclusion criteria and not meeting the exclusion criteria were considered for analysis.

group.title: Cobas 4800 Mutation Test
group.description: BRAF V600 mutations were analysed using Cobas 4800 mutation test

measure.title: Median Time Between Receipt of Sample and Determination of Result by Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test -Analytical Method
measure.description: This analytical method for cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test measured the time between receipt of samples to the result determination. It measured the time in days.
measure.population: All samples meeting the inclusion criteria and not meeting the exclusion criteria were considered for analysis.

outcome.title: Technician Work Time Between DNA Extraction and Result by Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test - Analytical Method
outcome.description: This cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test analytical method measures the working time required by the technician from the time of DNA extraction to the time to obtain the results. The time duration was measured in hours.
outcome.population: All samples meeting the inclusion criteria and not meeting the exclusion criteria were considered for analysis.

group.title: Cobas 4800 Mutation Test
group.description: BRAF V600 mutations were analysed using Cobas 4800 mutation test

measure.title: Technician Work Time Between DNA Extraction and Result by Cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test - Analytical Method
measure.description: This cobas 4800 BRAF V600 Mutation Test analytical method measures the working time required by the technician from the time of DNA extraction to the time to obtain the results. The time duration was measured in hours.
measure.population: All samples meeting the inclusion criteria and not meeting the exclusion criteria were considered for analysis.

outcome.title: Management of Discordance- Method Used to Manage Discordance
outcome.description: Crossing DNA, DNA from In-House method analysed with cobas, SNaPshot, DNA from cobas analysed with In-House method, external site control test, Sanger sequencing, Kit CE-IVD Therascreen RGQ Qiagen, Kit Therascreen RGQ BRAF + Pyrosequencing by another platform (PF), Pyrosequencing, Mutation detection On Another Block, (primitive tumor [prm. tmr]), Sequencing And Therascreen kit (Qiagen) were used for management of discordance between "in-house" method and Cobas 4800 mutation test.
outcome.population: The discordant sample population is defined as the samples whose result for BRAF V600 mutation by the "in-house" method did not show similar outcome with the cobas 4800 mutation test.

group.title: Discordant Group
group.description: This included 28 samples out of 420 samples, whose BRAF V600 mutation results, by INCa âin Houseâ Methods and cobas 4800 BRAF V600 mutation test did not show similar outcome.

measure.title: Management of Discordance- Method Used to Manage Discordance
measure.description: Crossing DNA, DNA from In-House method analysed with cobas, SNaPshot, DNA from cobas analysed with In-House method, external site control test, Sanger sequencing, Kit CE-IVD Therascreen RGQ Qiagen, Kit Therascreen RGQ BRAF + Pyrosequencing by another platform (PF), Pyrosequencing, Mutation detection On Another Block, (primitive tumor [prm. tmr]), Sequencing And Therascreen kit (Qiagen) were used for management of discordance between "in-house" method and Cobas 4800 mutation test.
measure.population: The discordant sample population is defined as the samples whose result for BRAF V600 mutation by the "in-house" method did not show similar outcome with the cobas 4800 mutation test.

class.title: DNA from In-House method analysed with cobas
DNA from cobas analysed with In-House method
KIT THERASCREEN RGQ BRAF+PYROSEQ. by other PF
Mutation detection on other Block, (prm. tmr)

outcome.title: Management of Discordance-Final Result for BRAF V600 Mutation Detection
outcome.description: The final results obtained by discordance management of the 28 discordant samples were BRAF V600 mutation, No BRAF V600 mutation and Non-evaluable. These results were further assessed by the Investigator and interpreted as final result.
outcome.population: The discordant sample population is defined as the samples whose result for BRAF V600 mutation by the "in-house" method did not show similar outcome with the cobas 4800 mutation test.

group.title: Final Result- Discordant Samples
group.description: This included 28 samples out of 420 samples, whose BRAF V600 mutation results, by INCa âin Houseâ Methods and cobas 4800 BRAF V600 mutation test did not show similar outcome.

measure.title: Management of Discordance-Final Result for BRAF V600 Mutation Detection
measure.description: The final results obtained by discordance management of the 28 discordant samples were BRAF V600 mutation, No BRAF V600 mutation and Non-evaluable. These results were further assessed by the Investigator and interpreted as final result.
measure.population: The discordant sample population is defined as the samples whose result for BRAF V600 mutation by the "in-house" method did not show similar outcome with the cobas 4800 mutation test.

reported_events.desc: As the samples were used instead of participants for analysis there were no serious or non-serious adverse events reported.

group.title: INCa Molecular Genetics Laboratory âin Houseâ Methods
group.description: BRAF V600 mutations were analysed using INCa (Institut National du Cancer [French National Cancer Institute]) molecular genetics laboratories using in-house methods

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The Study being conducted under this Agreement is part of the Overall Study. Investigator is free to publish in reputable journals or to present at professional conferences the results of the Study, but only after the first publication or presentation that involves the Overall Study. The Sponsor may request that Confidential Information be deleted and/or the publication be postponed in order to protect the Sponsor's intellectual property rights.
